text: انا مكنا له فى الارض وءاتينه من كل شىء سببا

translations.translation: We gave him power and authority on the earth and granted him a way to everything.
Say: "I will cite before you his commemoration." We gave him authority in the land and means of accomplishing every end.
We granted him power in the land and endowed him with all kinds of resources.
We had given him great power in the land and all kinds of resources.
Indeed We gave him authority in the land and bestowed him the means of everything.
Verily, We established him in the earth, and We gave him the means of everything.
Surely We established him in the land and granted him means of access to every thing.
We established him in the land, and We gave him a way to everything;
Lo! We made him strong in the land and gave him unto every thing a road.
We established him in the land, and gave him the means to achieve all things.
Verily We! We established him in the earth, and vouchsafed unto him of everything a way.
Indeed We had granted him power in the land and given him the means to all things.
Verily We established his power on earth, and We gave him the ways and the means to all ends.
Verily, We established him in the earth, and We gave him the means of everything.
We established him in the land and gave him means to all things.
We established him on earth, and gave him all kinds of means.
Indeed We established him upon the earth, and We gave him to everything a way.

[18:84] Indeed We empowered him throughout the land, by facilitating [for him] the journeying therein, and We gave him to everything, of which one might have need, a way, a route to lead him to that which he sought.
(Lo! We made him strong in the land and gave unto every thing a road) the knowledge of the roads and constellation.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: قصة ذي القرنين مشهورة وكان رومياً قريب العهد والتطبيق، إن ذا القرنين في هذا الوجود هو القلب الذي ملك قرنيه، أي: خافقيه شرقها وغربها { إنّا مكنّا له } في أرض البدن بالإقدار والتمكين على جمع الأموال من المعاني الكلية والجزئية والسير إلى أيّ قطر شاء من المشرق والمغرب

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: أخبر عنه سبحانه بقوله: { إِنَّا } من مقام عظيم جودنا وفضلنا { مَكَّنَّا لَهُ } وقدرناه { فِي ٱلأَرْضِ } تمكناً تاماً وقدرة كاملة { وَ } ذلك { آتَيْنَاهُ } أعطيناه تأييداً له وتعضيداً { مِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ سَبَباً } [الكهف: 84] موصلاً إلى مبتغاه وما أَمِلَه؛ يعني: وفَّقنا وهيأنا أسبابه للوصول إلى كل مطلوبٍ قَصَدَه وأراد الوصول { فَأَتْبَعَ سَبَباً } [الكهف: 85] حتى ارتكب أمر الوثوقة واتكاله علينا، وبإنجاحنا إياه إلى مبتغاه
